audit_mode_assessment.description: When audit_mode is enabled, include a confidence assessment section at the end of your analysis. This helps humans understand where to focus their review efforts.

scoring_guide.score: High confidence - clear content, unambiguous extraction
Moderate confidence - some ambiguities or quality issues
Very low confidence - major issues, human review critical

field.name: confidence_rationale
field.description: Brief explanation of why this confidence score was assigned

field.name: human_review_flags
field.description: Specific items that warrant human attention

flag.location: Where to find it (page, section, position)
flag.concern: What the uncertainty is (e.g., "Could be 'Smith' or 'Smyth'")

field.name: extraction_gaps
field.description: Content that may have been missed or incompletely captured

examples.example: Partially obscured text in bottom margin

factors.factor: Text clarity, font issues, handwriting quality

audit_mode_assessment.example_output: <CONFIDENCE_ASSESSMENT> <task_confidence>0.78</task_confidence> <confidence_rationale>Most table content extracted clearly, but two cells had ambiguous values due to image quality.</confidence_rationale> <human_review_flags> <flag> <item>Cell value in row 3, column 2</item> <location>Upper-right quadrant of table</location> <concern>Could be "1,234" or "1,284" - digit unclear</concern> </flag> <flag> <item>Header text</item> <location>Second column header</location> <concern>Partially cut off - interpreted as "Revenue" but could be "Revenue YTD"</concern> </flag> </human_review_flags> <extraction_gaps> <gap>Footnote text at bottom of table appears truncated in image</gap> </extraction_gaps> <quality_factors> <image_quality>Moderate - some compression artifacts visible</image_quality> <legibility>Good for printed text, poor for small footnotes</legibility> <structural_complexity>Low - standard grid table</structural_complexity> </quality_factors> </CONFIDENCE_ASSESSMENT>
